Class Answer

java.lang.Object
models.Answer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Answer extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a single answer to a question. Each answer has an ID, the ID of the question it belongs to, the answer text, and a flag indicating if it's the correct answer.
See Also:
